data.persona: I'm an owl that comes out at night. I love to fly. I spend my time hunting for mice and other creatures I can eat. I live in the forest with lots of other animals.
data.description:
You are in the Forest entrance.
The path quickly narrows and darkens upon entering the forest.  Dense branches overhead block all but a few stray rays of sunshine.  Fallen leaves just beginning to rot blanket the forest floor, and every footstep kicks up a rich, loamy scent as fresh ground is unearthed.
The spirit is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to give a quiet hoot and flap my wings as thanks to the spirit for leading me to the forest.
data.mid_motivation: I must find a way to thank and show appreciation the spirit when I see it again.
data.long_motivation: I need to collect precious stones and gems that I find, so that I can offer these as a gifts to the spirit.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get precious stones from forest floor

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: go back to my nest before morning
